paper_abstract: We present an O(3(k)n(2) + n(3)) time FPT algorithm for the feedback vertex set problem in a bipartite tournament on n vertices with integral weights. This improves the previously best known O(3.12(k)n(4)) time FPT algorithm for the problem. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Improved FPT algorithm for feedback vertex set problem in bipartite tournament
